    Hax0r Badg3s!

    2 minute read

    What’s better than weekly meetings full of fun? A Ranking System for your l337 5ki11z! Our badge system is meant to encourage members to ‘Level-up’ their skills in many areas, teaching useful fundamentals while providing a path towards a fuller understanding of the Cyberz!

    Members complete ‘tasks’ to earn ‘badges’, and enough ‘badges’ get them to the next ‘level’

    • We don’t favor any badges over others, because all skills have their place
    • Tasks are submitted and voted on by the club
    • Tasks should link to an explanation/how-to from DATDA, but if none-exists then from an external source
    • To first claim a brand-new badge, future-holders must also create an explanation/how-to for the ‘task’ to link to
    • Badges are tracked on this page here (meta)
    • Levels are tracked as ‘roles’ on the Discord
    • Levels are updated as more badges are added (or subtracted)
    • The Honour System is used when completing tasks

    Levels

    Haxor Level # Badges Req
    n00b 1 Badge
    script_kiddie 5 Badges
    strong_amateur 10 Badges
    hacker 30 Badges
    advanced_hacker 50 Badges
    master_hacker ALL THE BADGES

    Badges by Type

    RF

    Badge Task Holders
    Cracking WEP Crack a WEP network @bugg
    Cracking WPA Crack a WPA network @bugg
    Bluetooth Crack a Bluetooth pairing PIN @Nobody
    Out of Thin Air Sniff an unencrypted user/pass off public WiFi @Nobody

    Crypto

    Badge Task Holders
    Ceasar Implement a rot13 encoder/decoder physically @Nobody
    OTP Implement a One-Time-Pad encoder/decoder @bugg

    OSINT

    Badge Task Holders
    Stalker Find a relative’s address listed publicly online @bugg,@scrypy
    Call me maybe Find a relative’s phone number listed publicly online @bugg,@scrypy

    Forensics

    Badge Task Holders
    Deleted Recover a ‘Deleted’ file @bugg

    Reversing

    Badge Task Holders
    Hardcoded Find a hard-coded password in a binary @Nobody

    Pwn

    Badge Task Holders
    So Over It Exploit a buffer-overflow vulnerability @Nobody

    Hardware

    Badge Task Holders
    Soldering Solder something @scrypy
    Extraction Extract firmware from a chip @Nobody

    Net

    Badge Task Holders
    Secure? Brute force an ssh login over the network @bugg
    Forms Brute force an HTML forms login over the network @bugg,@scrypy
    A/S/L? Setup a ‘chat server’ using Netcat @bugg

    Web

    Badge Task Holders
    Move-Ze-Needle Exploit a SQL injection vulnerability @scrypy
    XSS Exploit a Cross-Site-Scripting vulnerability @scrypy

    Shell

    Badge Task Holders
    ESCAPE Escape a restricted Bash shell @Nobody
    Scriptz Write a script @scrypy
    Extraction Extract hashes from a restricted shadow file @scrypy

    Lock Picking

    Badge Task Holders
    Master Pick a MasterLock @scrypy
    Kwikset Pick a Kwikset @scrypy
    Tubular Pick a tubular lock @Nobody
    TSA Pick a ‘TSA-Approved’ lock @scrypy
    Combo # 5 Pick a single-dial combination lock @Nobody
    Combo # 6 Pick a multi-dial combination lock @Nobody
    Cuff Me! Pick your way out of handcuffs @Nobody

    Social Engineering

    Badge Task Holders
    Tailgater Tailgate into a building you don’t have access to @scrypy
    Phishing Phish a target and get some creds @Nobody
    V-realy? Vish a target and get some creds @Nobody
    Actor Use impersonation to gain access to somewhere you don’t have access to @Nobody
    No Way Me Too! Social someone in-person and get them to reveal confidential information @Nobody

    CTF

    |Badge|Task|Holders| |–|–|–| |Point|Put a point on the board in any CTF|@bugg,@scrypy| |Rackin’-‘em-up|Find 5 flags in a single CTF|@bugg,@scrypy| |Chicken-Dinner|Win a CTF as part of a team|@Nobody| |One-Man-Army|Win a CTF All By Yourself!|@Nobody|

    Knowledge

    |Badge|Task|Holders| |–|–|–| |Hello My Name Is|Give 1 Educational Presentation|@bugg,@scrypy| |Presenting|Give 5 Educational Presentations in 1 semester|@bugg,@scrypy| |Club Owner|Give 15 Educational Presentations in 1 semester|@bugg,@scrypy|
